charges.charge_description: 18:922(g)(1); 18:921(a); 18:924(a)(2) - FELON IN POSSESSION OF A FIREARM(2)

charges.charge_disposition: 120 months imprisonment; 3 years supervised release; $1,000.00 fine; $100.00 mandatory special assessment as to each count; SEE DOCUMENT #56 FOR AMENDED JUDGMENT

charges.charge_description: 18:924(c)(1)(A)(i); 18:924(c)(1)(D); 18:924(c)(2); 18:921(a) - CARRYING A FIREARM DURING A DRUG TRAFFICKING CRIME(3)

charges.charge_disposition: 120 months imprisonment, consecutive to Count 2; 3 years supervised release, concurrent with Count 2; $1,000.00 fine; $100.00 mandatory special assessment as to each count; SEE DOCUMENT #56 FOR AMENDED JUDGMENT

charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1); 21:841(b)(1)(B)(iii) - POSSESSION WITH INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE COCAINE BASE(1)

charges.charge_disposition: dismissed at sentencing on motion of the United States
